sub_questions.question_text: (Use Article)

parts.question_text: ______ intelligent person always thinks before speaking.

sub_questions.question_text: (Formation of sentences) Change the following sentences as suggested in the bracket:

parts.question_text: Salman is reading a book (Change into Past Perfect)
Najma and Rehana studied very hard. (Change into Negative)
Mehwish always speaks the truth. (Change into interrogative)
Pakistan won the match by two runs. (Change into Future Perfect Tense)
My mother will prepare the lunch. (Change into Past Continuous Tense)
Does she open the door? (Change into Affirmative Tense)
Ali said to her why was she sitting on this table (Punctuate)
Add suffix to: agree

questions.question_text: Translate the following paragraph into Urdu or Sindhi:
questions.content: God has blessed us with countless healthy food and milk is one of them. It is a perfect food having sweet and delicious taste. We get malik mostly form cows and buffaloes. It makes us healthy and strong. We make curd, butter and cheese form it.

questions.question_text: Read the following passage and answer the questions given below:
questions.passage: Educating boys and girls together has always been an important and stressful issue. Many parents believe that the educational process can be more effective if the classes are divided according to the gender of the students. Although same gender schools are considered too conservative and strict in today's time. Nevertheless, there are still supporters of this manner of education. Some parents are not in favour of co-educational system as they feel that the presence of opposite gender distracts the attention of students and prevents them from concentrating on studies. On the other hand, supporters of co-education feel that as boys and girls are different, it is a valuable experience for both genders to communicate with each other. Moreover, the earlier boys and girls begin to communicate, the sooner they acquire social skills, which are crucial to communicating freely in the world. Further, if there are girls in the class, boys may well possible try to behave better in order not to lose face in front of the girls

sub_questions.question_text: According to the writer, why are some parents not in favour of the co-education system?
According to the writer, why are socializing skills important?
Find a word from the above passage that means:
Make a summary of the above passage
